targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nin_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' AND status_code=200;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bvn_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' AND status_code=200;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sms_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' AND status_code=200;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ai_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' AND status_code=200;

SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at) as time, 'NIN' as service, COUNT(*) as requests FROM nin_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '7 days' GROUP BY 1 UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at), 'BVN', COUNT(*) FROM bvn_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '7 days' GROUP BY 1 UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at), 'SMS', COUNT(*) FROM sms_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '7 days' GROUP BY 1 UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at), 'AI', COUNT(*) FROM ai_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '7 days' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT u.email as startup, COUNT(CASE WHEN g.path LIKE '/api/v1/nin/%' THEN 1 END) as nin_calls, COUNT(CASE WHEN g.path LIKE '/api/v1/bvn/%' THEN 1 END) as bvn_calls, COUNT(CASE WHEN g.path LIKE '/api/v1/sms/%' THEN 1 END) as sms_calls, COUNT(CASE WHEN g.path LIKE '/api/v1/llm/%' THEN 1 END) as ai_calls, COUNT(*) as total_calls FROM gateway_access_logs g JOIN auth_users u ON u.id::text = g.user_id WHERE g.created_at>now()-interval '7 days' AND u.is_deleted=false GROUP BY u.email ORDER BY total_calls DESC;

SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at) as time, COUNT(*) as requests, COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code >= 400 THEN 1 END) as errors FROM sms_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at) as time, COUNT(*) as requests, COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code >= 400 THEN 1 END) as errors FROM ai_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at) as time, COUNT(*) as requests, COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code >= 400 THEN 1 END) as errors FROM nin_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at) as time, COUNT(*) as requests, COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code >= 400 THEN 1 END) as errors FROM bvn_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ai_conversations WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sms_messages WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours';
SELECT bucket as time, p50_ms, p95_ms, p99_ms FROM v_service_latency_pcts WHERE service='sms' AND bucket>now()-interval '24 hours' ORDER BY time;
SELECT bucket as time, p50_ms, p95_ms, p99_ms FROM v_service_latency_pcts WHERE service='ai' AND bucket>now()-interval '24 hours' ORDER BY time;
SELECT bucket as time, p50_ms, p95_ms, p99_ms FROM v_service_latency_pcts WHERE service='nin' AND bucket>now()-interval '24 hours' ORDER BY time;
SELECT bucket as time, p50_ms, p95_ms, p99_ms FROM v_service_latency_pcts WHERE service='bvn' AND bucket>now()-interval '24 hours' ORDER BY time;
SELECT ROUND(100.0 * SUM(server_err) / NULLIF(SUM(total),0), 2) FROM v_service_error_rate WHERE service='nin' AND bucket>now()-interval '24 hours';
SELECT ROUND(100.0 * SUM(server_err) / NULLIF(SUM(total),0), 2) FROM v_service_error_rate WHERE service='bvn' AND bucket>now()-interval '24 hours';
SELECT ROUND(100.0 * SUM(server_err) / NULLIF(SUM(total),0), 2) FROM v_service_error_rate WHERE service='sms' AND bucket>now()-interval '24 hours';
SELECT ROUND(100.0 * SUM(server_err) / NULLIF(SUM(total),0), 2) FROM v_service_error_rate WHERE service='ai' AND bucket>now()-interval '24 hours';

SELECT COALESCE(model,'unknown') as model, COUNT(*) as conversations, ROUND(AVG(tokens_used),2) as avg_tokens, ROUND(AVG(response_time_ms),2) as avg_response_ms FROM ai_conversations WHERE created_at>now()-interval '7 days' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY conversations DESC;
